metadata.title: Robuust Marketing - High-end digital infrastructure
metadata.description: Robuust Marketing delivers bulletproof development, hosting and security SLAs for SMBs.

header.readyToStartDescription: Schedule a free consultation and discover how we can bring your project to life.

hero.subtitle: Robuust Marketing delivers bulletproof development, hosting and security SLAs for SMBs.

bentoGrid.subtitle: From pixel-perfect design to bulletproof hosting. We handle every aspect of your digital presence.

design.title: Custom Design
design.description: Custom UI/UX that captures your brand identity and converts visitors into customers. Every pixel with a purpose.

development.title: Modern Development
development.description: Built with React, Next.js and TypeScript for lightning-fast performance and maintainable code.

hosting.title: Managed Hosting
hosting.description: Enterprise-grade infrastructure with NGINX and Cloudflare on dedicated servers in Germany & Finland.

security.title: Bulletproof Security
security.description: OAuth, 1Password integrations, DKIM/DMARC management and full GDPR compliance. Your data stays safe.

analytics.title: Smart Analytics
analytics.description: GA4, Meta Pixel, first-party tracking with Taggrs and company identification with Snitcher for complete insights.

performance.title: Lightning-Fast Performance
performance.description: Optimized for Core Web Vitals with Varnish caching and edge delivery for sub-second load times.

seo.title: SEO & Marketing
seo.description: Full-stack digital marketing including Meta, TikTok and Google Ads deployment via Hello Its Me.

support.title: Hassle-Free Support
support.description: Personal support with hard SLAs. We're there when you need us. No waiting times, no excuses.

dienstenPage.subtitle: From design to development, from hosting to marketing. We deliver the complete digital infrastructure your business needs.
dienstenPage.packagesSubtitle: Start with a solid foundation. Our packages offer everything you need for a successful online presence.

dienstenPage.ctaSubtitle: Schedule a free consultation and we'll help you make the right choice for your situation.

portfolioShowcase.subtitle: From B2B corporate to hospitality - we build websites that work.

founderIntro.paragraph1: I'm Robin, founder of Robuust Marketing. For over 15 years I've been building websites and digital infrastructure for businesses that want to grow seriously.
founderIntro.paragraph2: No fancy office, no unnecessary overhead. Instead: direct lines, clear communication and results you can build on. I believe in craftsmanship without fuss - work that's simply good.

productStack.subtitle: Two proven packages for different growth phases. Each with bulletproof SLAs.
productStack.note: Prices are indicative. Each project is quoted individually.

techStack.subtitle: We select the stack that fits your scale. No bloatware, pure performance.

offerte.message: We have received your request in good order. Our team will review your project and send you a personalized quote within 24 hours.

toolingPage.subtitle: We deliberately choose modern, reliable technology. No outdated frameworks, but a stack that scales and performs.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Our stack is optimized for speed. On average, our websites achieve a Lighthouse score of 95+.

seo.title: SEO
seo.description: Server-side rendering and optimal meta tags ensure excellent findability in Google.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: Type-safe code and modern tooling make maintenance simple and predictable.

future.title: Future
future.description: We only use technology with a strong community and active development.

wordpress.name: WordPress & Avada
wordpress.description: WordPress with the Avada theme is our go-to solution for clients who want to manage their own content. Avada offers extensive design options and an intuitive drag-and-drop builder for maximum flexibility.

nextjs.name: Next.js & React
nextjs.description: Next.js is our primary framework for building modern websites. With React as its foundation and features like Server Components, App Router and optimal SEO support, it's the perfect choice for any website.

typescript.name: TypeScript
typescript.description: TypeScript adds type-safety to JavaScript, resulting in fewer bugs and more maintainable code. Every line of code we write is type-safe.

tailwind.name: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.description: Tailwind CSS is our utility-first CSS framework. It enables us to quickly build custom designs without the overhead of traditional CSS.
benefits: Dark mode out of the box

cms.name: Headless CMS
cms.description: We work with various headless CMS solutions depending on your needs. From Sanity to Contentful, we choose the best tool for your situation.

cloudflare.name: Cloudflare
cloudflare.description: Cloudflare protects and accelerates all our websites. From DDoS protection to caching, it's an essential part of our infrastructure.

nginx.name: NGINX
nginx.description: NGINX is our web server of choice. With excellent performance and scalability, it's the backbone of our hosting infrastructure.

additionalTools.title: Additional tools
additionalTools.subtitle: Besides our core stack, we use various tools for specific tasks.

cta.title: Curious about our approach?
cta.subtitle: We'd love to tell you more about how we use this technology for your project.

portfolioPage.subtitle: From B2B consultancy to fine dining restaurant. Check out a selection of our recent WordPress projects.

werkwijzePage.subtitle: Our proven approach ensures a smooth process and an end result you can be proud of. No surprises, just results.

phases.title: Our 5 project phases
phases.subtitle: Every project goes through the same structured phases for optimal quality and predictability.

discovery.name: Discovery
discovery.description: We start with a thorough analysis of your business, goals and target audience. This forms the foundation for everything that follows.

design.name: Design
design.description: We translate the strategy into a visual design that fits your brand and converts optimally.

development.name: Development
development.description: The design is transformed into a lightning-fast website using modern technology.

launch.name: Launch
launch.description: After extensive testing, your website goes live. We ensure a smooth launch.

support.name: Support
support.description: After launch, we remain available for maintenance, updates and further development.

timeline.title: Average timeline
timeline.subtitle: The lead time of a project depends on its complexity. An average website project takes 6-12 weeks from start to launch.

collaboration.title: How we collaborate
collaboration.subtitle: Transparent communication and short lines. That's how we prefer to work.

weeklyUpdates.title: Weekly updates
weeklyUpdates.description: You receive a weekly update on the progress of your project.

directContact.title: Direct contact
directContact.description: No intermediaries. You have direct contact with the people working on your project.

documentation.title: Transparent documentation
documentation.description: All decisions and changes are documented and shared.

feedback.title: Fast feedback loops
feedback.description: Short iterations so we can quickly adjust where needed.

cta.title: Ready to start?
cta.subtitle: Schedule a free consultation and discover how we can realize your project.

overPage.subtitle: Robuust Marketing is a full-service digital agency specialized in web development, hosting and online marketing. We help businesses grow with a solid digital foundation.

story.title: Our story
story.paragraph1: Robuust Marketing was born from a simple observation: too many companies struggle with their digital presence. Not due to lack of ambition, but because of fragmented services and lack of technical expertise.
story.paragraph2: We believe every business deserves a professional online presence. That's why we offer everything under one roof: from the first design to the last line of code, from hosting to ongoing maintenance.
story.paragraph3: With over 70 websites under management and years of experience in web development, we are the partner that makes your digital ambitions a reality. No empty promises, but measurable results.

values.title: What we stand for
values.subtitle: Our core values are not just nice words on paper. They are the principles that guide every decision and every project.

quality.title: Passion for quality
quality.description: We don't deliver half work. Every project gets our full attention and expertise.

speed.title: Speed without compromise
speed.description: Short turnaround times without sacrificing quality or functionality.

reliable.title: Reliable & transparent
reliable.description: Clear communication, fair prices and commitments we keep.

personal.title: Personal approach
personal.description: Not just a number, but a real partnership. We think proactively with you.

technical.title: Technical excellence
technical.description: We work with the latest technologies: React, Next.js, TypeScript and more. No outdated WordPress templates, but modern solutions that scale.

strategic.title: Strategic thinking
strategic.description: A website is more than a digital brochure. We look at your business goals and translate them into an effective online strategy.

cta.title: Ready to work together?
cta.subtitle: Let's get acquainted and discuss how we can help your business grow.

partnersPage.subtitle: We work together with specialized partners to offer you the best solutions. From marketing to infrastructure, every aspect is covered by experts.

trusted.title: Trusted relationships
trusted.description: Years of collaboration with proven partners who maintain the same quality standards.

expertise.title: Combined expertise
expertise.description: Access to specialized knowledge without having to manage multiple agencies.

streamlined.title: Streamlined processes
streamlined.description: Efficient workflows between partners for faster delivery and better results.

helloitsme.name: Hello Its Me
helloitsme.description: Our marketing partner for Meta, TikTok and Google Ads. Together we provide a complete digital strategy from website to advertisements.

taggrs.name: Taggrs
taggrs.description: Server-side tracking solutions for accurate data and better privacy compliance. We are a certified implementation partner.

cloudflare.name: Cloudflare
cloudflare.description: Enterprise-grade security and performance for all our hosting clients. DDoS protection, CDN and more.

hetzner.name: Hetzner
hetzner.description: Reliable dedicated servers in Germany and Finland. European hosting for optimal privacy and speed.

tools.title: What we work with
tools.subtitle: We work with the best tools and platforms in the industry to help your business grow. From analytics to e-commerce, we have the expertise.

cta.title: Become a partner?
cta.subtitle: Are you specialized in a complementary service and looking for a reliable web partner? Let's talk.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Robuust Marketing, based in the Netherlands, is responsible for the processing of personal data as shown in this privacy statement. We respect the privacy of all users of our website and ensure that the personal information you provide is treated confidentially.

dataCollection.title: 2. What data do we collect?
dataCollection.intro: We collect the following personal data:
items: Name and contact details (email, phone number)
Company data (company name, position)
Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information)
Usage data (how you use our website, which pages you visit)

dataUsage.title: 3. What do we use your data for?
items: To contact you in response to a request
To improve and personalize our services
To inform you about our services (only with your consent)
To comply with legal obligations
For website analysis and optimization

cookies.title: 4. Cookies
cookies.intro: Our website uses cookies. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device. We use:

functional.title: Functional cookies:
functional.description: necessary for the functioning of the website

analytical.title: Analytical cookies:
analytical.description: to gain insight into the use of our website (Google Analytics)

marketing.title: Marketing cookies:
marketing.description: only with your consent, for showing relevant advertisements

cookies.outro: Via our cookie banner you can manage your preferences and give or withdraw consent.

retention.title: 5. Retention period
retention.content: We do not retain your personal data longer than strictly necessary to achieve the purposes for which your data is collected. Contact details are kept for a maximum of 2 years after the last contact, unless there is an ongoing customer relationship.

thirdParties.title: 6. Sharing with third parties
thirdParties.intro: We only share your data with third parties if this is necessary for the execution of our services:
items: Hosting providers (servers in EU: Germany/Finland)
Analytics services (Google Analytics - anonymized)
Email service providers (for sending messages)
thirdParties.outro: We never sell your data to third parties.

rights.title: 7. Your rights
items: Access your personal data
Correct your personal data
Have your personal data deleted
Object to the processing
Transfer your data (data portability)
rights.outro: You can submit a request via {email}. We will respond within 30 days.

security.title: 8. Security
security.content: We take the protection of your data seriously and take appropriate measures to prevent misuse, loss, unauthorized access, unwanted disclosure and unauthorized modification. Our website uses an SSL certificate and our servers are located in secure data centers in Europe.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: Do you have questions about this privacy statement or about the processing of your personal data? Please contact us via {email}.

robuust.title: Robuust Marketing:
robuust.description: the sole proprietorship based in the Netherlands, hereinafter referred to as "contractor".

client.title: Client:
client.description: the natural or legal person entering into an agreement with Robuust Marketing.

services.title: Services:
services.description: all services offered by Robuust Marketing, including but not limited to web design, web development, hosting and maintenance.

applicability.title: Article 2 - Applicability
applicability.content1: These general terms and conditions apply to all offers, quotations, work, agreements and deliveries of services by or on behalf of Robuust Marketing.
applicability.content2: Deviations from these terms are only valid if they have been expressly agreed in writing.

quotes.title: Article 3 - Quotations and offers
items: All quotations are without obligation and valid for 30 days, unless otherwise stated.
Prices in quotations are exclusive of VAT, unless otherwise stated.
An agreement is concluded after written acceptance of the quotation by the client.

execution.title: Article 4 - Execution of the agreement
items: Robuust Marketing will execute the agreement to the best of its knowledge and ability.
The client ensures that all data necessary for execution is provided in a timely manner.
Stated deadlines are indicative and not strict deadlines. Exceeding them does not entitle to compensation or termination.

payment.title: Article 5 - Payment terms
items: Payment must be made within 14 days of the invoice date, unless otherwise agreed.
For projects above €2,500, a 50% advance payment may be requested before the work begins.
In case of late payment, the client is legally in default and statutory interest is due.
Hosting and maintenance costs are invoiced monthly or annually in advance.

ip.title: Article 6 - Intellectual property
items: All intellectual property rights to the developed materials rest with Robuust Marketing, unless otherwise agreed in writing.
After full payment, the client obtains a right of use for the delivered materials.
Robuust Marketing retains the right to use the design for its own promotional purposes, unless otherwise agreed.

hosting.title: Article 7 - Hosting and maintenance
items: Hosting services are provided with an uptime guarantee of 99.9%, measured annually.
Maintenance work that falls outside the agreed package will be quoted separately.
The client is responsible for making backups of their own content, unless a maintenance contract states otherwise.

liability.title: Article 8 - Liability
items: The liability of Robuust Marketing is limited to the amount that is paid out under the liability insurance in the relevant case.
Robuust Marketing is not liable for indirect damage, including consequential damage, lost profits or missed savings.
The client indemnifies Robuust Marketing against claims from third parties related to the delivered services.

termination.title: Article 9 - Cancellation and termination
items: Ongoing agreements (hosting, maintenance) can be terminated with a notice period of 1 month.
When terminating projects that are in progress, the work performed until then is due.
Robuust Marketing can terminate the agreement immediately in case of non-payment or bankruptcy of the client.

confidentiality.title: Article 10 - Confidentiality
confidentiality.content: Both parties are obliged to maintain confidentiality of all confidential information obtained within the framework of the agreement. This obligation also applies after termination of the agreement.

disputes.title: Article 11 - Applicable law and disputes
items: Dutch law applies exclusively to all agreements.
Disputes will be submitted to the competent court in the district where Robuust Marketing is located.
Parties will first attempt to resolve disputes through mutual consultation.

contact.title: Article 12 - Contact
contact.content: For questions about these general terms and conditions, please contact us via {email}.

avgPage.subtitle: Privacy and data protection are not optional, but a requirement. We ensure that your website and data fully comply with the General Data Protection Regulation.

privacyByDesign.title: Privacy by Design
privacyByDesign.description: All websites we build are designed from the ground up with privacy in mind. We only collect data that is strictly necessary.

euHosting.title: EU Hosting
euHosting.description: All our servers are located in Europe (Germany and Finland). Your data never leaves the European Union, guaranteeing full GDPR compliance.

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.description: All data transfer is secured with SSL/TLS encryption. Data at rest is stored encrypted on our servers.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We are fully transparent about what data we collect and why. No hidden tracking or unexpected data collection.

dpa.title: Data Processing Agreement
dpa.description: For all our clients, we draw up a data processing agreement that meets all GDPR requirements.

rights.title: Data subject rights
rights.description: We facilitate all data subject rights: access, correction, deletion, objection and data portability.

whatIsGdpr.title: What is the GDPR?
whatIsGdpr.content: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), also known as AVG in Dutch, is the European privacy legislation that has been in effect since May 25, 2018. This law regulates how organizations may collect, process and store personal data. For websites, this includes obligations regarding cookies, contact forms and analytics.

cookieBanner.title: Cookie consent banner:
cookieBanner.description: Cookiebot integration for correct consent collection

analytics.title: Privacy-friendly analytics:
analytics.description: GA4 with anonymized IP addresses or alternatives like Plausible

forms.title: Secured forms:
forms.description: Contact forms with minimal data collection and encryption

ssl.title: SSL certificates:
ssl.description: HTTPS on all pages for secure data transfer

privacy.title: Privacy statement:
privacy.description: Custom privacy policy for your website

serverSide.title: Server-side tracking
serverSide.content: As a partner of Taggrs, we offer server-side tracking solutions. This means tracking data runs through your own server instead of directly to Google or Meta. This provides better data quality, works without third-party cookies, and is more privacy-friendly because you have full control over what data is shared.

dpa.title: Data Processing Agreement
dpa.content: When we act as a processor for your personal data (for example with hosting or maintenance), we draw up a data processing agreement. This document regulates the responsibilities, security measures and rights in accordance with the GDPR. Feel free to ask us for an example.

questions.title: Questions?
questions.content: Do you have questions about GDPR compliance or want to know how we can make your website compliant? Contact us via {email}.

referentiesPage.subtitle: Read the experiences of companies we've helped with their online presence.

tvdb.name: Thomas van der Berg
tvdb.quote: Robuust completely transformed our website. The new site loads lightning-fast and we now receive quality leads daily. The collaboration was perfect.

lb.name: Lisa Bakker
lb.quote: Finally a party that understands what we need. The team thinks proactively and always delivers more than expected. Our online sales increased by 200%.

mj.name: Mark Jansen
mj.quote: After years of working with a slow, outdated website, switching to Robuust was a relief. Fast delivery, good communication and a beautiful result.

sdv.name: Sandra de Vries
sdv.quote: The hosting and maintenance at Robuust gives me peace of mind. I don't have to worry about anything and can focus on my core business.

pv.name: Peter Visser
pv.quote: What started as a website has grown into a complete digital strategy. Robuust is a real partner in our online growth.

es.name: Emma Smit
es.quote: Our webshop performs better than ever. The Robuust team not only built a beautiful site, but also thinks along about conversion optimization.
